text: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."
translation.id.indonesian: dan (Allah mengetabui) ucapan Muhammad: "Ya Tuhanku, sesungguhnya mereka itu adalah kaum yang tidak beriman".
